verses.verse: Unto you will I cry <WH7121>, O Lord <WH3068> my rock <WH6697>; be not silent <WH2814> to me <WH2790>: lest, if you be silent to me <WH4911>, I become like them that go down <WH3381> into the pit <WH953>.
Hear <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469>, when I cry <WH7768> unto you <WH5375>, when I lift up my hands <WH3027> toward your holy <WH6944> oracle <WH1687>.

Draw me not away <WH4900> with the wicked <WH7563>, and with the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205>, which speak <WH1696> peace <WH7965> to their neighbors <WH7453>, but mischief <WH7451> is in their hearts <WH3824>.

Give <WH5414> them according to their deeds <WH6467>, and according to the wickedness <WH7455> of their endeavours <WH4611>: give <WH5414> them after the work <WH4639> of their hands <WH3027>; render <WH7725> to them their desert <WH1576>.
Because they regard <WH995> not the works <WH6468> of the Lord <WH3068>, nor the operation <WH4639> of his hands <WH3027>, he shall destroy <WH2040> them <WH1129>, and not build them up.
Blessed <WH1288> be the Lord <WH3068>, because he has heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469>.

The Lord <WH3068> is my strength <WH5797> and my shield <WH4043>; my heart <WH3820> trusted <WH982> in him <WH5826>, and I am helped: therefore my heart <WH3820> greatly rejoices <WH5937>; and with my song <WH7892> will I praise him <WH3034>.
The Lord <WH3068> is their strength <WH5797>, and he is the except <WH3444> strength <WH4581> of his anointed <WH4899>.
Save <WH3467> your people <WH5971>, and bless <WH1288> your inheritance <WH5159>: feed <WH7462> them also <WH5375>, and lift them up for ever <WH5769>.
